page.title: 08FARMING.CROPS.ANIMALS
page.content: Number of farms in the area,15.No of farmers who answered our questionaire ,6.Total area surveyed 332 hectares on 6 farms.Average size,55 hectares. Height of farms,90_160 metres above sea level.Soils:Mixed clays on well drained slopes.Soil nutrients: animal slurry.Then chemicals when required. Summer feed:grazing plus nutrients. Winter feed:66% silage,17% hay,17% mixed Fodder.Breeding:66% own breeding programmes using A.I. Total animals on 6 farms:Sheep ,640 Beef cattle 395,Dairy cattle 276,Pigs 275,Horses 1.Range of crops on 6 farms:Grazing 235,Hay & Silage 27,Oats & Peas 16,Mixed Corn 9,Rape 5,Potatoes 5, Some irrigation methods used.
